data.title: Auditions
data.meta_description: Auditions for Virginia Repertory Theatre, casting union and non-union actors
data.text:
Thanks for your interest. There are no current listings.

To receive an email when new listings are added, please select AUDITIONS as an area of interest when you sign up to receive our enewsletter.

Please direct all questions to casting@virginiarep.org.

About Auditioning

Listings usually include the ages needed and whether you will be asked to submit a video, or -- if the audition is in person -- whether you will be asked to dance and sing in addition to either performing a monologue or reading from the script.

When an appointment is required for a Non-Equity Open Call, anyone can request an appointment until all time slots are taken. When an appointment is required for an EPA Call, members of AEA can request an appointment until all time slots are taken.

Unless another contact is listed in the announcement, please direct all questions to casting@virginiarep.org.

Virginia Repertory Theatre is an equal opportunity employer. Performers of all ethnicities, races, gender identities, and abilities are strongly encouraged to audition.

Anti-Racism Commitment & Accountability Statement
